messages.content:
Dear Andrew,

I'm writing to you in the midst of a crucial election campaign for the future of Britain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Tories are planning to demolish thousands of homes on council estates in our area. This will destroy communities and force people from their homes.
Labour is the party of equality, always standing for fairness. We in introduced the Race Relations and Human Rights Acts and the Minimum Wage.

Everyone will be given a right to a basic bank account, and to encourage saving we will bring back the Saving Gateway, where the Government adds 50p for each £1 saved by working age people on low incomes.

housing.content: The Tories are planning to demolish thousands of homes on council estates in our area. This will destroy communities and force people from their homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have spent my whole life in Hammersmith, and 25 years as a councillor and MP here. Why? Because service over self is what I believe in.

contactInformation.address:
FREPOST LON 16192
28 Greyhound Road
London W6 8NX

images.caption: Vote Labour leaflet featuring candidate Andy Slaughter.

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS - Hammersmith is a tight constituency. Please don't split the anti-Tory vote. Help re-elect Andy. Remember to use your second vote to back the Labour Council candidates as well as me.
